thread.title: Dennie Brooks
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Dennie Brooks

author: Dennie Brooks
title: Dennie Brooks
text:
I consistently work with Donna Maxwell at Premium Mortgage and she
is the best. I look for a Mortgage Broker who is responsive and all
the Mortgage Brokers at Premium are that. They return calls quickly, provide Mortgage Approval Letters easily and responsibly. I have my closings happen on time . And always they are pleasant and good natured. This is a stressful situation for buyers and the Mortgage Brokers at Premium Mortgage understand that and provide an easy comforting process for the buyers. You just can't work with a better firm
